channel.title: Login
channel.description:
Basically sometimes when you log in you'll be at spawn or it will just put you in the wrong place. I was in the end the other day and it dropped me off the edge of the world. Hybrid was mining it dropped him in some lava. I was mining and came back and I was at spawn. The other day every time I logged out\in I ended up back at spawn. Sometimes you spawn inside a wall and have to re-log also.
This is pretty annoying just curious if it's something that can be fixed.

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: @the_hybrid1995 the_hybrid1995
item.description:
@the_hybrid1995 wrote:

I just don’t see how this plugin interferes with the logging in and placement of the character entity.

Why not download the other plugins and simply edit them?

[quote=“Phaze One, post:9, topic:447523”]The mod does as it should. Containers, spawners and expensive blocks are all replaced with other entities at a distance so that they remain theoretically un-xrayable.[/quote]I honestly don’t see why people even use xrays. It’s much more efficient and simplistic to make a strip mine at levels 10-13.

Read full topic

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“the_hybrid1995, post:7, topic:447523”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=550418.msg4034617#msg4034617 date=1341088058]

[quote author=the_hybrid1995 link=topic=550418.msg4034612#msg4034612 date=1341087951]

[quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=550418.msg4034399#msg4034399 date=1341073755]
its because of the anti xray mod you sometimes login a few blocks below where you were
[/quote]You stated to staff that the xray was still working, so clearly the mod isn’t helping much.

I think we should try a different plugin for a bit, or just remove it for now.
[/quote]It’s working.
[/quote]How exactly is it working? If it’s causing glitches, shouldn’t we at least try another one? Just as trial. Then, if need be, we switch back to this.

I don’t see any harm in trying to fix the bugs.

Also, what exactly does this mod do? I read about it on another post with the weird shading affects on chests and furnaces.[/quote]

The mod does as it should. Containers, spawners and expensive blocks are all replaced with other entities at a distance so that they remain theoretically un-xrayable.

Read full topic

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Generally, the containers are loaded differently. Though, to be honest, I have said what you said in terms of trying out different plugins but the harsh reality is that there is no other acceptable plugins we can use aside from this.

All the other ones are plugins that, for example, broadcast it on public chat when a person finds an ore which effectively spams the chat. I was speaking to moparisthebest and the configuration of the plugin will be played around with at some point.

Read full topic

its because of the anti xray mod you sometimes login a few blocks below where you were

I think we should try a different plugin for a bit, or just remove it for now.
[/quote]It’s working.[/quote]How exactly is it working? If it’s causing glitches, shouldn’t we at least try another one? Just as trial. Then, if need be, we switch back to this.

I don’t see any harm in trying to fix the bugs.

Also, what exactly does this mod do? I read about it on another post with the weird shading affects on chests and furnaces.

Read full topic
